text: "Crazy is a 1961 song by Patsy Cline and was written by Willie Nelson. It went to number 9 in the United States, number 8 in Canada, number 56 in Australia and number 14 in the United Kingdom and Ireland. It has been covered by numerous artists including Willie Nelson and Linda Ronstadt. title: Crazy (Willie Nelson song)
